statements.name: PROC SGPLOT
statements.description: Creates a single-cell plot from input data.

statements.name: STYLEATTRS
statements.description: Specifies visual attributes for a graph such as colors, markers, and so on, within the procedure step, without having to change the ODS style template.

statements.name: BAND
statements.description: Creates a band that highlights part of a plot.
statements.help:
BAND X=variable |  Y=variable |  
 UPPER=numeric-value  |  numeric-variable 
LOWER=numeric-valuenumeric-variable
</option(s)>;

statements.name: BLOCK
statements.description: Creates one or more rectangular blocks containing text values.

statements.name: BUBBLE
statements.description: Creates a bubble plot in which two variables determine the location of the bubble centers and a third variable controls the size of the bubble.

statements.name: DENSITY
statements.description: Creates a density curve that shows the distribution of values for a numeric variable.

statements.name: DOT
statements.description: Creates a dot plot that summarizes the values of a category variable.

statements.name: DROPLINE
statements.description: Creates one or more drop lines from data point(s) to one or both axes. The line(s) can be horizontal, vertical, or both.

statements.name: ELLIPSE
statements.description: Adds a confidence or prediction ellipse to another plot.

statements.name: ELLIPSEPARM
statements.description: Adds an ellipse to the primary plot, specified by axis, slope, and origin parameters.

statements.name: FRINGE
statements.description: Creates a fringe plot on the X axis of an X-Y plot.

statements.name: GRADLEGEND
statements.description: Generates a gradient legend that maps the data range of a response variable to a range of colors.

statements.name: HBAR
statements.description: Creates a horizontal bar chart that summarizes the values of a category variable.

statements.name: HBARBASIC
statements.description: Creates a horizontal bar chart that is compatible with other categorization charts as well as basic plots, such as scatter and series plots, and box plots.

statements.name: HBARPARM
statements.description: Creates a horizontal bar chart based on a pre-summarized response value for each unique value of the category variable. You can also assign variables to the upper and lower limits.

statements.name: HBOX
statements.description: Creates a horizontal box plot that shows the distribution of your data.

statements.name: HEATMAP
statements.description: Creates a plot of color-coded rectangles for the response variable of a pair of X and Y variables after it bins the data in two dimensions.

statements.name: HEATMAPPARM
statements.description: Generates an X, Y grid of rectangles from the values of two independent variables and colors the rectangles to represent the values of a third variable, which can be a response variable or a group variable.

statements.name: HIGHLOW
statements.description: Creates a display of floating vertical or horizontal lines or bars that represent high and low values.

statements.name: HISTOGRAM
statements.description: Creates a histogram that displays the frequency distribution of a numeric variable.

statements.name: HLINE
statements.description: Creates a horizontal line chart. You can use the HLINE statement with the HBAR statement to create a horizontal bar-line chart.

statements.name: INSET
statements.description: Adds a text box inside the axes of the plot.

statements.name: KEYLEGEND
statements.description: Adds a legend to the plot.

statements.name: LEGENDITEM
statements.description: Creates a legend item that can be included in the legend.

statements.name: LINEPARM
statements.description: Creates a straight line specified by a point and a slope.

statements.name: LOESS
statements.description: Creates a fitted loess curve.

statements.name: NEEDLE
statements.description: Creates a plot with needles connecting each point to the baseline.

statements.name: PBSPLINE
statements.description: Creates a fitted penalized B-spline curve.

statements.name: POLYGON
statements.description: Draws one or more polygons from data stored in a data set.

statements.name: REFLINE
statements.description: Creates a horizontal or vertical reference line.

statements.name: REG
statements.description: Creates a fitted regression line or curve.

statements.name: SCATTER
statements.description: Creates a scatter plot.

statements.name: SERIES
statements.description: Creates a line plot.

statements.name: SPLINE
statements.description: Creates a series plot with a quadratic Bézier spline interpolation that produces smooth curves.

statements.name: STEP
statements.description: Creates a step plot.

statements.name: SYMBOLCHAR
statements.description: Defines a marker symbol using a Unicode character that can be referenced in other statements.

statements.name: SYMBOLIMAGE
statements.description: Defines a marker symbol using an image.

statements.name: TEXT
statements.description: Displays the associated text values at (X, Y) locations in the graph.

statements.name: VBAR
statements.description: Creates a vertical bar chart that summarizes the values of a category variable.

statements.name: VBARBASIC
statements.description: Creates a vertical bar chart that is compatible with other categorization charts as well as basic plots, such as scatter and series plots, and box plots.

statements.name: VBARPARM
statements.description: Creates a vertical bar chart based on a pre-summarized response value for each unique value of the category variable.

statements.name: VBOX
statements.description: Creates a vertical box plot that shows the distribution of your data.

statements.name: VECTOR
statements.description: Creates a vector plot that draws arrows from a point of origin to each data point.

statements.name: VLINE
statements.description: Creates a vertical line chart (the line is horizontal).

statements.name: WATERFALL
statements.description: Creates a waterfall chart computed from input data.

statements.name: XAXIS
statements.description: Specifies the axis options for the X axis.

statements.name: X2AXIS
statements.description: Specifies the axis options for the X2 axis, which is displayed on the top side of the graph.

statements.name: XAXISTABLE
statements.description: Creates a basic plot that displays data values at specific locations along the horizontal axis.

statements.name: YAXIS
statements.description: Specifies the axis options for the Y axis.

statements.name: Y2AXIS
statements.description: Specifies the axis options for the Y2 axis, which is displayed on the right side of the graph.

statements.name: YAXISTABLE
statements.description: Creates a basic plot that displays data values at specific locations along the vertical axis.

statements.name: ATTRIB
statements.description: Associates a format, informat, label, and length with one or more variables.

statements.name: BY
statements.description: Orders the output according to the BY groups.

statements.name: FORMAT
statements.description: Associates formats with variables.

statements.name: LABEL
statements.description: Assigns descriptive labels to variables.
statements.help:
Form 1: Creates a descriptive label for one or more variables.
LABEL variable-1=’text-string’ < ...variable-n=’text-string>; 
Form 2: Removes the label from one or more variables.
LABEL variable-1 = ' ' < ...variable-n=’ ‘>; | variable-1 = < ...variable-n= >

statements.name: WHERE
statements.description: Subsets the input data set by specifying certain conditions that each observation must meet before it is available for processing.
